definition: long or drawn out/remote in time or space/leisurely/to swing/pensive/worried

sentences.english: It is a Guangzhou has a long history of 2222 years of cultural city.
sentences.chinese: 廣州是一座有2222多年悠久歷史的文化名城。

sentences.english: The mangosteen fruit has a long history of medicinal use in Chinese and Ayurvedic medicine.
sentences.chinese: 山竹果在中醫和印度草藥醫學裏的藥用歷史悠久。

sentences.english: By the way, I'm in Branford College, which is of long history.
sentences.chinese: 對了，我住在布蘭福學院，它可是有着悠久的歷史哦。

sentences.english: The history of Liuyang fireworks dates back to the year 1740.
sentences.chinese: 瀏陽花炮創制於1740年，生產歷史悠久。

sentences.english: Shanghai classical garden enjoys a long history and has achieved great accomplishment in gardening art.
sentences.chinese: 上海園林歷史悠久，在造園藝術上取得了很高成就。

sentences.english: Noodles in China have a long history.
sentences.chinese: 麪條在中國擁有悠久的歷史。

sentences.english: For others it is merely a way to share in a centuries-old tradition.
sentences.chinese: 對另外一些人而言，爆竹純粹是分享一種悠久的傳統。

sentences.english: Daye, it has a long history and goes back.
sentences.chinese: 大冶，歷史悠久，淵遠流長。

sentences.english: Our great motherland has the very centuries -old history.
sentences.chinese: 我們偉大祖國有非常悠久的歷史。

sentences.english: The sweet love story that is older than the sea.
sentences.chinese: 甜蜜的愛情故事悠久於大海。

sentences.english: Yueqing has a long history, human and cultural resources.
sentences.chinese: 樂清歷史悠久，人文薈萃。

sentences.english: Yongdeng County, which has a long history, is the gateway of the Hexi Corridor.
sentences.chinese: 永登縣歷史悠久，是通往河西走廊的門戶。

sentences.english: Tibetan Buddhism Tangka art has a long history and superb techniques.
sentences.chinese: 藏傳佛教的唐卡藝術歷史悠久，技藝精湛。

sentences.english: The exploitation of natural gas and gas water in Sichuan Basin has a long history.
sentences.chinese: 四川盆地天然氣和氣田水開發歷史悠久。

sentences.english: Saxong is famous for its long history and rich cultural traditions.
sentences.chinese: 薩克森州以悠久的歷史和豐富的文化傳統而聞名於世。

sentences.english: Folk literature of Shandong University has a long history.
sentences.chinese: 山東大學的民間文學專業有着悠久的歷史。

definition: lit. source is distant and the flow is long (idiom); fig. sth goes back to the dim and distant past/a lot of water has flowed under the bridge since then
to be famous far and wide (idiom)
the birthplace (of sth good)/the cradle (e.g. of art)
before the present/(a long period) ago
deposits accumulated over long periods/fig. valuable experience, accumulated wisdom
seasoned/honed to perfection over centuries/special reserve
